Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image of Kenyan MP Simba Arati in a hospital bed is unrelated to the recent funeral incident.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it relies on a misleading image that is unrelated to the incident.

Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the image is from a previous incident in 2014 when Arati was involved in a scuffle in parliament.
Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the severity of the situation by using the misleading image to imply that Arati was seriously injured in the funeral brawl.
Falters at times: The claim falters by using an outdated image to support its narrative, which undermines its credibility.
